abstract: North Attleborough, Mass, home of former New England Patriots tight end and convicted murderer Aaron Hernandez is on the market for $1.5 million.

headline.main: Aaron Hernandez’s Home Is for Sale

snippet: The 5,600-square-foot home of Aaron Hernandez, the convicted murderer and former Patriots tight end, is on the market in North Attleborough, Mass., for $1.5 million.
lead_paragraph: The 5,600-square-foot home of Aaron Hernandez, the convicted murderer and former Patriots tight end, is on the market in North Attleborough, Mass., for $1.5 million.
